name: Blackjack Pro: 21 Vegas Casino
description:
Do you love blackjack? We do! 21 Pro provides the most beautiful and realistic blackjack experience in the App Store.

Free chip reloads if you run out!

- Play the best!
- You can use gestures to control your actions!
- Learn the mathematically correct strategy with our "Mastering the Game" lessons or by asking the dealer
- Learn how to count cards like the pros...then you can really take it to the casinos!
- See how you rank up against everyone else, or challenge your friends in Game Center
- Customize the rules to your liking. You can even customize the table and cards!
- See detailed statistics about your play

The Fun Vegas Casino Experience on the go! Don't forget to check our Slots, Slot Machine and other casino apps, including blackjack, roulette, craps and poker.
